issue.title: Chose quality for image generation
issue.body:
### Feature Description

In the image generation call, add a 'quality' parameter to the API, allowing users to choose output quality (standard or HD)

### Problem it Solves

Currently there is no way to chose the quality. I guess it defaults to standard.

### Proposed Solution

 add a 'quality' parameter to the API.
